channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WI

item.title: Report E-2025020215
item.description:
Report E-2025020215

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-17T21:14:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-20
  • City: FRANKLIN
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 3000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 0947 ET, XPO notified ERTS of a cargo release at terminal XML. It was reported that approximately 1 quart of UN1866 released from 1) 55-gallon metal drum due to improper loading. The release impacted trailer # 3178627. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and determined that terminal personnel are capable of cleaning the release with PPE available on site. The terminal does not currently have any overpacks onsite. ERTS had contractor drop off 95-gallon poly drum which was used.
